text:
@profgalloway It’s everywhere worse than this.

If you don’t know someone who has exact symptoms but can’t get tested due deferment for (young) age, no recent travel, or no known contact with COVID-19 positive individual, then you need to check in with your friends and see how they’re doing.

text: How COVID-19 testing works in America: you can’t get tested unless you’ve had direct contact with a person that’s positive, but that person can’t get tested unless they had direct contact with a person that tested positive, so it’s a cycle of no testing and lots of sick people.
